features: UNLEASH MORE WITH LESS - INTRODUCING OUR 3-PACK 7OZ ACTIVATED CHARCOAL BARS! Transform your skincare routine with our 3-Pack Activated Charcoal Bars. Our Charcoal Soap for women and men is suitable for all skin types with exceptional care. A great everyday charcoal face soap and body wash for those suffering from acne. Discover the unparalleled benefits of embracing more with our premium charcoal bar soap.

UNLOCK RADIANT SKIN WITH OUR ACTIVATED CHARCOAL DEAD SEA SALT MINERAL SOAP enriched with nourishing argan oil and shea butter. Activated charcoal draws out impurities, promoting a flawless complexion and addressing skin conditions. Proven to absorb harmful substances, it, along with dead sea mineral salts, deeply cleanses, heals, and tones, restoring your skin's natural pH for a revitalized, healthy glow.

IDEAL FOR ALL SKIN TYPES - Embrace the versatility of our natural skincare product, suitable for dry, oily, or combination skin. Our activated charcoal face bar effectively addresses excess oil in oily skin, replenishes dry skin, and balances natural oils in combination skin. Shea butter provides moisture and gentle purification for sensitive skin, while argan oil detoxifies impurities and enhances your skin's natural radiance.

IDEAL GIFT FOR SKINCARE ENTHUSIASTS: Elevate gifting with One With Nature 7oz 3-pack charcoal soap bar, meticulously packed in an exquisite gift box. Perfect for skincare lovers, it offers a luxurious and thoughtful present, combining effective beauty with a touch of indulgence. Unwrap the joy of radiant skin with our 3-pack charcoal soap for face!

ONE WITH NATURE IS A FAMILY-OWNED and operated business committed to delivering top-notch skincare. We believe in using only the finest natural ingredients. If you're not completely satisfied with the quality of our product, let us know – We will take care of you.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Soap Making at the Dead Sea ACTIVATED CHARCOAL BENEFITS: Activated charcoal draws dirt and other micro-particles to the surface of skin, helping you to achieve a flawless complexion and mitigate skin conditions. Activated charcoal powder is proven to absorb thousands of times its own mass in harmful substances DETOX, CLEANSE, HEAL, TONE: The Dead Sea’s rich mineral salts and activated charcoal deeply cleanse, heal and tone the skin while restoring the natural PH. RELIEVE PSORIASIS, ECZEMA, AND ACNE: Dead Sea Mineral Salts have become famous for its many natural therapeutic ways to treat and care for problem skin, due to its rare composition of minerals at high concentrations. One With Nature Dead Sea Salts are harvested from the southern Dead Sea, where mineral content is at its highest.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this soap and it has now replaced a moisturizing bath soap I had been using for years.
reviews.reviewText: I was introduced to this brand of soap by my husband who gave me one of the bars of charcoal soap of the same brand. I very much liked this soap, but decided to explore some of the different soaps made by this company. I decided on this lemon sage soap because I thought the lemon scent would smell fresh.I absolutely love this soap. My previous brand was supposed to be a moisturizing soap, but every winter, I had to put moisturizing cream on my legs after a bath or they would itch like crazy by the next day from dryness. After taking a bath with this soap, my legs feel soft and moisturized, and there is no itching. Other things that I like about this soap is that it's a large bar and lasts me quite a while; the lemon scent is not strong, but has a delicate fresh smell; it provides so much lather with very little effort. In the time I have been using this soap, my skins is softer and not dry at all. I have also noticed that it rinses off easily and leaves no soap residue on my skin.This is a soap that I will continue buying. It may cost a little more than some soaps, but the large bar lasts so much longer, you get more for your money. So, it ends up being more economical than the less expensive soaps, and it is much better for your skin.UPDATE 11/21/20:I initially bought 2 3-packs of this soap in lemon and shea butter formulas about 1 1/2 years ago. I have been using it for both my mother and I, and still have two bars left. So, it really does last a long time. I just re-ordered 2 3-packs of the lemon/sage and lavender formulas. I love the rich, thick lather that these soaps produce with very little rubbing of the bars. I am 74 and my Mom is over 100, and this soap has truly helped to keep our skin moisturized. The dried scabbing skin I had on my elbows is non-existent now. In some lighting, the skin on my forearms used to look somewhat dried and scaly , but it hasn't looked like that since using this soap. Even at over 100, my Mom's skin looks healthy and people have commented on how good her skin looks. I do tend to favor the lemon and lavender scents just because they smell so good. This is the only bath soap I will use from now on, and highly recommend it.I hope this review is helpful for you. I will update this review if my opinion changes or if I have additional information.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Activated charcoal is an extremely softening skin product!
reviews.reviewText: This activated charcoal soap is a great soap! I absolutely love and recommend it for its natural cleanliness, skin softening effects, and deodorizing effects! I read about a natural deodorant and soap in an article that I stumbled onto while reading about old time home products and remedies that are still superior to today's products but unheard of by today's consumers. I read about charcoal soaps, and remembered hearing my mother tell about my grandmother making lurch soaps when she was a child. I saw an ad for an activated charcoal soap, and I decided to purchase one and try it. First, it made the soap dish gray, but that soap was AWESOME! My skin became softer, I found that this soap evidently had a deodorizing effect, as I was still without odor after being unable to bathe for 48 hours, my skin was always so soft after washing using this activated charcoal soap, and I always feel so clean after bathing with it. However, if you use only white washcloths. you will have to bleach them to remove all of the gray color residue. I use a few older blue washcloths and bleach them. This soap is definitely worth the extra work doing the laundry! After the first charcoal bar that I used. I was hooked on charcoal soap. I have looked for it in local stores, but I haven't been able to locate any, so I will continue to order this from Amazon! GREAT SOAP!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well for dry skin
reviews.reviewText: I've used several formulas of the One With Nature brand bar soaps and have found them all to work well for my skin. But my favorite is this argan oil & shea butter bar. My skin tends toward dryness and I've tried several types of soap to combat this, while also wanting my skin to feel clean without greasiness. This soap does the job very well for me. I've even gotten my husband and son to start using them and they are very satisfied with the results as well...both have dry skin, like me. The fragrance is pleasant, with no noticeable added scent. I highly recommend this brand and this seller. Packaged well and timely delivery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cleans and tightens the skin
reviews.reviewText: Nice face wash product on the cheap. It last, smells nice, and cleans as described.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Just received my order so have only used a couple of times so far but I’m already a fan. Smells great and has the silkiest creamiest lather ever. Anxious to see how my skin improves.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: If you are looking for a natural soap with no scent…that gives you a little lather…this is the way to go. Great soap. I use it everyday. Will probably get about two weeks or so out of each bar. Priced okay. Would purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It is a very moisturizing soap
reviews.reviewText: Well, it hasn't even arrived yet. Delivery with Amazon lately is so slow. It is great soap as I have bought some in the grocery store.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This soap is very amazing
reviews.reviewText: Baby let me tell you ? I have very dry skin I've been itching so much that lotion or oil could not put any moisturizer into my skin when I get out the shower. When I say this soap is amazing my skin is moisturize baby yes. My skin is no longer itchy my skin is soft and silky. I will be buying this product again thank you so much for making this product.
